/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of the city's towering structures. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. Construction cranes can be seen in the distance, hinting at the ongoing development and growth of the city. The street itself is lined with trees, providing a touch of greenery amidst the urban landscape. Cars and buses are seen driving on the road, adding to the dynamic nature of the scene. The image is a snapshot of life in a modern city, where tradition and progress coexist.
